AT.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
AT.description: Erlebe in dieser nie zuvor dagewesenen Übersetzung des japanischen Rollenspielklassikers „Mother“, wie die Sage um EarthBound begann. EarthBound Beginnings – eine Erfindung des bekannten Autors Shigesato Itoi – ist ein unkonventionelles, originelles Rollenspiel, in dem sich junge Helden im Alltag statt mit Schwertern und Magie mit Haushaltsartikeln und hellseherischen Fähigkeiten zur Wehr setzen. EarthBound Beginnings ist sowohl lustig als auch dramatisch und fesselnd – ein Muss für EarthBound-Fans und Spieler, die ein etwas anderes Rollenspiel suchen!

AU.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
AU.description: See how the EarthBound saga began, in this previously unreleased translation of the Japanese role-playing classic known as Mother. Devised and scripted by renowned Japanese writer Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings is an offbeat and irreverent twist on the RPG genre; with a modern day setting, and young heroes who arm themselves not with swords and magic but with household items and psychic powers. Funny, dramatic and engaging, EarthBound Beginnings is a must-play for EarthBound fans or anyone in search of an RPG with a difference!

BG.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
BG.description: See how the EarthBound saga began, in this previously unreleased translation of the Japanese role-playing classic known as Mother. Devised and scripted by renowned Japanese writer Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings is an offbeat and irreverent twist on the RPG genre; with a modern day setting, and young heroes who arm themselves not with swords and magic but with household items and psychic powers. Funny, dramatic and engaging, EarthBound Beginnings is a must-play for EarthBound fans or anyone in search of an RPG with a difference!

BE.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
BE.description: Découvre comment la saga EarthBound a commencé, dans cette traduction du classique de jeu de rôle japonais connu sous le nom de Mother. Conçu par le célèbre écrivain japonais Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings est un tournant original et décalé dans le genre RPG ; avec un cadre moderne et de jeunes héros qui s'arment non pas avec des épées et de la magie mais avec des objets ménagers et des pouvoirs surnaturels. A la fois drôle et captivant, EarthBound Beginnings est un indispensable aussi bien pour les fans de EarthBound que pour ceux qui recherchent un RPG différent !

ES.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
ES.description: Descubre el origen de la saga de EarthBound con esta traducción no publicada anteriormente del clásico videojuego de rol japonés Mother. Creado por el reconocido escritor Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings es todo un giro irreverente y original respecto a los juegos de rol tradicionales. Con una ambientación moderna, los jóvenes héroes no se valdrán de espadas ni magia, sino de objetos cotidianos y poderes psíquicos. Divertido y cautivador, EarthBound Beginnings es un título imprescindible para fans de EarthBound y para quien busque una experiencia diferente.

movies.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings: Entrevista con el desarrollador

IT.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
IT.description: Scopri com'è iniziata la saga di EarthBound in questa traduzione, precedentemente non pubblicata, del classico gioco di ruolo giapponese conosciuto come Mother. Scritto e ideato dal celebre Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings è un intreccio originale e irriverente del genere GDR. Un titolo con un'ambientazione moderna e giovani eroi armati né di spade né di magie ma di oggetti domestici e poteri psichici. Divertente, emozionante e coinvolgente, EarthBound Beginnings è un titolo imperdibile per i fan di EarthBound o per chiunque sia alla ricerca di un GDR con una marcia in più!

NL.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
NL.description: Ontdek hoe de EarthBound-legende begon, in deze nooit eerder uitgebrachte vertaling van de Japanse RPG-klassieker die bekend staat als Mother. Bedacht en geschreven door de befaamde Japanse schrijver Shigesato Itoi. EarthBound Beginnings geeft een ongewone en gedurfde draai aan het RPG-genre; met een hedendaagse setting en jonge helden die, in plaats van zwaarden en magie, gebruik maken van huisraad en psychische krachten. Komisch, dramatisch en aangrijpend, EarthBound Beginnings is een aanrader voor EarthBound-fans, of iedereen die opzoek is naar een eigenzinnige RPG!

movies.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings: Interview met de ontwikkelaar

PT.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
PT.description: Descobre como começou a saga de EarthBound, nesta tradução nunca antes publicada do clássico RPG japonês conhecido como Mother. Criado e escrito pelo aclamado escritor japonês Shigesato Itoi, EarthBound Beginnings representa uma variação irreverente e original do género RPG: um cenário contemporâneo e jovens heróis armados, não com espadas e magia, mas com objetos do dia-a-dia e poderes psíquicos. Cómico, dramático e cativante, EarthBound Beginnings é obrigatório para todos os fãs de EarthBound ou para todos aqueles que procuram um RPG diferente!

movies.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings: Entrevista com o responsável

RU.name: EarthBound™ Beginnings
RU.description: В этой ранее недоступной англоязычной версии японской ролевой игры Mother вы узнаете, как начиналась история EarthBound. С легкой руки признанного японского сценариста Сигесато Итои, EarthBound Beginnings предлагает шутливый взгляд на жанр ролевых игр. Действие игры происходит в современном мире, и юные герои вооружены не мечами и магией, а предметами обихода и экстрасенсорикой. Увлекательная смесь юмора и пафоса. EarthBound Beginnings — подарок для всех поклонников EarthBound и любителей необычных RPG!
